message.body: Hi. I went to a party with coconut last night. Did you trick or treat?
Did you guys dress up? We went at Penn on Friday.
I wore a fox mask I made. How are you?
That is cute. I'm good, very tired, school is tough
I bet. Are you doing okay in your classes?
Yes, although I did get a C on a take home test that I am unhappy about. I just have sooo much reading tonight, and a riding lesson and its cold
Aw, thanks. Hopefully Nate will make something, I am going over to his place tonight. How are things with you?
I'm okay. I've been looking into going to school for occupational therapy. I have to do more research.
It's an in demand job and seems very decent.
Where are you thinking about studying? How long would the program be?
I would have to do a year of prereqs and then it's a 2 year program. I bumped into someone i went to grad school with and she's going for it. She says th
e field is welcoming to artists. Salaries start at $65,000. I'll send you a video about it
I could see you being good at it/ it being a good fit for you.
You help all different people learn to do things. Like helping kids with ms play better or old people shave.
Wow that's great. You are very patient, you would be a good ot. Ella has an ot and they've been working together well for years now
I feel like I am not good with people..I wasn't a great waitress ha
I'm not sure if I am either. But this is working one on one on a project for a limited time. Seems easier.
Yeah for sure. Are you still thinking Waldorf at all?
I love Waldorf but I'm not sure if I want to be in charge of a class and I'm concerned the job market is very limited. I want to visit the Brooklyn Waldo
rf. I was thinking that maybe pediatric ot would have some of the same qualities, ie: learning to play,etc.
Yeah one on one seems a little easier. My horse is feisty..the riding lessons are such a good escape
Take a photo for me?
ï¿¼Of course!
Too cute! What's it's name?
Her name is Annie. She's super serious. Will you have off anytime next weekend, birthday weekend...
It is!? This is nearing our 1 year anniversary! I'm free Sunday... I cld try to get out of work..
Remember bowling with big cat?
Oh yeah... And the dive?
Haha, yeah Cory clued me in to the work surprise party
Are you going out tonight?
No, I'm in with Ella
How's little Ella? I just drank a hot drink with rum and don't want to go out...it is first friday, tho.
She's good, she is in gifted now, pretty stoked. It's too cold for first fri!
I know. I always regret staying in, though. When will I see you?
Same here, and then it's a whole month until the next one. Did you go out? I can go out next Friday
I will try to get out of work.
